attributes.action: Cap utility companies before they force us all into poverty
attributes.additional_details:
Notice how ALL of the utility companies (Oil, Gas, Electricity, Water) waste no time pushing up the price of domestic fuel if oil prices rise, but NEVER hurry to reduce it if the price per barrel is reduced.
We are now pushing most people o benefits into a situation whereby up to 50% of their benefits are paying fuel bills, reducing what they have available for food and clothing significantly.
it is about time the Government took a hold of these companies and effectively regulate their charges.
